item.description:
HI all,

Kimball's in Westford opens today, I know it's April fools but this is no joke!

Either meet at Kimballs after work or if anyone wants to ride from the Burlington Mall area, let me know, Doug Deegee44@Hotmail.com

Come join me for the best ice cream this side of anything!

Flavors:

Banana*

Black Raspberry

Butter Pecan

Buttercrunch

Butterscotch

Cappuccino Crunch*

Caramel Cashew Chip

Cherry Vanilla Chip

Chocolate

Chocolate Almond

Chocolate Chip

Chocolate Nut

Chocolate Mint Oreo*

Chocolate Chip Cookie-Dough

Chocolate Peanut Butter

Chocolate Raspberry Swirl

Coconut Almond Chip

Coffee

Coffee Heath Bar Crunch

Coffee Oreo

Cookie & Cream

Frozen Pudding

German Chocolate Fudge*

Gingersnap Molasses*

Grapenut

Heath Bar Crunch

Heavenly Mash*

Kahlua Crunch

M&ampM

Malted Milk Ball*

Maple Walnut

Maple Walnut (Sugar Free)

Mint Oreo

Mint Chocolate Chip

Mocha Almond

Mocha Almond Assault

Mocha Chip

Orange Pineapple

Oreo

Peach*

Peanut Butter Chip

Peppermint Stick

Pistachio Nut

Pralines & Cream*

Pumpkin*

Raspberry Chocolate Chip

Rum Raisin*

Strawberry

Vanilla

Vanilla Peanut Butter

Vanilla Swiss Almond

White Chocolate Almond*

Their Carlisle Location opens on April 8th!

Paul
item.name: Wednesday Ride Series - Kimball's opens April 1st!
